lines.text: What is this?
Nothing.
Come on. What is it? Is it a bomb or something? You planning on blowing up Plainfield?
No, it's a present for my father.
Are all these people relatives?
Oh, those are just the ones we talk to. There's a whole tribe of Hertzes out west somewhere. We're very big on breeding. I think they reproduce right there on the piano.
Why do you always call me "mysterious?"
Because you are.
Aren't you ever serious?
I was serious last year. This year I'm having fun.
Uh, I want to stop now.
Why do you wish to stop now?
I'm tired of all the questions.
Why do you think I'm asking them?
I don't know. I guess to get to know me better.
Why do you think I wanna know you better?
To help me, I guess.
Do you think you need help?
Sometimes. Does this fence go all around the place?
Yes, it does. Do you think it's to keep people out or to keep people in?
Confinement to continue until termination procedures are authorized.
